Specific function: low growth rate, bacteria doesn't need a lot of energy to survive

Fate:
This one isn't so important - predators 
are dilute enough that bacteria can escape

Amino acids: F, K, N, P, S, T
Specific function: broad metabolism, bacteria can eat a wide variety of things

Amino acids: F, L, I, M, V, A, P
Specific function: facultative anaerobe, bacteria can surive in both aerobic and anaerobic environments
Fate: Bacteria that don't have broad metabolism but do have this can survive
